Get player statistics by game

cfl_game_player_stats.Rd

Get player statistics by game

cfl_game_player_stats(
  season = NA,
  game_id = NA,
  week = NA,
  team = NA,
  event_type = NA
)

Arguments

game_id

(Integer optional): Game ID filter for querying a single game Can be found using the cfbd_game_info() function
week

(Integer optional): Week - values from 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff (i.e. 2013 or earlier)
team

(String optional): D-I Team
year

(Integer required): Year, 4 digit format(YYYY)
season_type

(String default regular): Select Season Type: regular or postseason
category

(String optional): Category filter (e.g defensive)
Offense: passing, receiving, rushing
Defense: defensive, fumbles, interceptions
Special Teams: punting, puntReturns, kicking, kickReturns
conference

(String optional): Conference abbreviation - Select a valid FBS conference
Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC
Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC
verbose

Logical parameter (TRUE/FALSE, default: FALSE) to return warnings and messages from function

Source

http://api.cfl.ca/v1/games/?include=playbyplay

Value

cfl_game_player_stats() - A data frame with 32 variables:

game_id : integer.

UUID for game

season : integer.

Season game played

week : integer.

Week of Season

date_start : character.

Start date of kickoff

team : character.

Player team

cfl_central_id : integer.

UUID for player

first_name : character.

Player first name

middle_name : character.

Player middle name

last_name : character.

Player last name

birth_date : character.

Player DOB

pass_attempts : integer.

Pass Attempts

pass_completions : integer.

Pass Completios

pass_net_yards : integer.

Net Passing Yards

pass_long : integer.

Long Pass

pass_touchdowns : integer.

Passing TDs

pass_completion_percentage : character.

Completition Percentage

pass_efficiency : character.

Pass Efficiency Rating

pass_interceptions : integer.

Interceptions Thrown

pass_fumbles : integer.

Fumbles while passing

rush_attempts : integer.

Rush attempts

rush_net_yards : integer.

Net rushing yards

rush_long : integer.

Longest rush

rush_touchdowns : integer.

Rushing touchdowns

rush_long_touchdowns : integer.

Longest rushing TD

receive_attempts : integer.

Targets

receive_caught : integer.

Receptions

receive_yards : integer.

Receiving yards

receive_long : integer.

Longest reception

receive_touchdowns : integer.

Receiving TDs

receive_long_touchdowns : integer.

Long receiving TD

receive_yards_after_catch : integer.

Yards After Catch

receive_fumbles : integer.

Fumbles after reception

punts : integer.

Punts

punt_yards : integer.

Punt Yards

punt_net_yards : integer.

Net Punt Yards

punt_long : integer.

Longest Punt

punt_singles : integer.

Punt Singles

punts_blocked : integer.

Punts Blocked

punts_in_10 : integer.

Punts downed inside 10

punts_in_20 : integer.

Punts downed inside 20

punts_returned : integer.

Punts Returns Defended

punt_returns : integer.

Received Punts Returns

punt_returns_yards : integer.

Punt Return Yards

punt_returns_touchdowns : integer.

Punt Return TDs

punt_returns_long : integer.

Longest Punt Return

punt_returns_touchdowns_long : integer.

Longest Punt Return TD

kick_returns : integer.

Kick Returns

kick_returns_yards : integer.

Kick returns yards

kick_returns_touchdowns : integer.

KR Touchdowns

kick_returns_long : integer.

Longest kick return

kick_returns_touchdowns_long : integer.

Longest kick return TD

field_goal_attempts : integer.

Field goal attempts

field_goal_made : integer.

Field goals made

field_goal_yards : integer.

Attempt distances

field_goal_singles : integer.

Field goal singles

field_goal_long : integer.

Longest field goals

field_goal_missed_list : character.

List of missing distances

field_goal_points : integer.

Points from field goal attempts

kicks : integer.

Kickoffs

kick_yards : integer.

Kickoff yards

kicks_net_yards : integer.

Net kickoff yards

kicks_long : integer.

Longest kickoff

kicks_singles : integer.

Kickoff singles

kicks_out_of_end_zone : integer.

Kicks out of end zone

kicks_onside : integer.

Onside kicks

one_point_converts_attempts : integer.

XP attempts

one_point_converts_made : integer.

XP conversions

tackles_total : integer.

2 pt attempts

tackles_defensive : integer.

2 pt conversions

tackles_special_teams : integer.

Total tackles

sacks_qb_made : integer.

Defensive tackles

interceptions : integer.

Special teams tackles

fumbles_forced : integer.

Sacks made

fumbles_recovered : integer.

Interceptions forced

passes_knocked_down : integer.

Fumbles forced

fumbles_recovered : integer.

Fumble recoveries

passes_knocked_down : integer.

Batted passes

Examples

# \donttest{
  cfl_game_player_stats(year = 2020, week = 15, team = "BC")

#> Error in cfl_game_player_stats(year = 2020, week = 15, team = "BC"): unused argument (year = 2020)

# }
